org.eclipse.bpel.simpl.ui.extensions
Interface IStatementEditor

All Known Implementing Classes:
AStatementEditor
public interface IStatementEditor

Author:
hahnml The interface with all methods which have to be implemented by every StatementEditor extension contributor.
